title: What is the meaning behind the song “Donna” by Richie Valens, Los Lobos? - Quora

response.answer_text: It probably means he either loved or was obsessed with a woman named “Donna” who left him and he misses her. Other than that, I see no “hidden meaning” between the lines of the song. “…I had a girlDonna was her nameSince she left meI've never been the same…”
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Angela V. Woodhull
